| json field=_raw "insight.signals[*].ruleId", "insight.tags",  "insight.created", "eventTime", "insight.timeToDetection" ,"insight.assignee", "operator.email",  "insight.status", "insight.severity", "insight.source" , "insight.entityValue","insight.entityType", "insight.entityId", "insight.entitySensorZone" ,"insight.description",  "insight.name", "insight.readableId", "insight.id",  "insight.confidence"  as insight_ruleId, insight_tags, insight_createdAt, insight_event_time , insight_time_to_detection , insight_assignee , operator_email, insight_status, insight_severity, insight_source, entity_value, entity_type, entity_id, entity_sensor_zone ,insight_description, insight_name, insight_readableId, insight_Id, insight_confidence nodrop

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_record_failure*
| timeslice 15m
//| count by metadata_sourceCategory, %"fields.reason", _timeslice
| count by %"fields.reason", _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column %"fields.reason"

_index=sec_record_failure*
| timeslice 15m
//| count by metadata_sourceCategory, %"fields.reason", _timeslice
| count by metadata_sourceCategory, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column metadata_sourceCategory

_index=sec_record_failure*
| count as today by metadata_sourceCategory, %"fields.reason"
//| sort _count
| compare with timeshift 1d 1 as vs_yesterday
| "https://{{instance}}/ui/#/search/create?query=_sourceCategory%3D%3Cmy_sc%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%5Bsubquery%3A%20_index%3Dsec_record_failure*%20metadata_sourceCategory%3D%3Cmy_sc%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%7C%20count%20by%20metadata_sourceMessageId%0A%20%20%20%20%7C%20metadata_sourceMessageId%20as%20_messageId%0A%20%20%20%20%7C%20compose%20_messageId%20maxResults%3D10000%5D%0A%7C%20_size%20as%20bytes%0A%7C%20timeslice%201s%0A%7C%20count%20by%20_timeslice%2C%20_messageId%2C%20bytes%2C%20_sourceCategory%2C%20_raw%20%0A%7C%20sort%20by%20_timeslice&startTime=-15m&endTime=-10m" as url
//| "https://service.au.sumologic.com/ui/#/search/create?query=_sourceCategory%3D%3Cmy_sc%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%5Bsubquery%3A%20_index%3Dsec_record_failure*%20metadata_sourceCategory%3D%3Cmy_sc%3E%0A%20%20%20%20%7C%20count%20by%20metadata_sourceMessageId%0A%20%20%20%20%7C%20metadata_sourceMessageId%20as%20_messageId%0A%20%20%20%20%7C%20compose%20_messageId%20maxResults%3D10000%5D%0A%7C%20_size%20as%20bytes%0A%7C%20timeslice%201s%0A%7C%20count%20by%20_timeslice%2C%20_messageId%2C%20bytes%2C%20_sourceCategory%2C%20_raw%20%0A%7C%20sort%20by%20_timeslice&startTime=-15m&endTime=-10m" as url
| replace(url,"%3Cmy_sc%3E",metadata_sourceCategory) as url
| toURL(url,"show_failed_events") as show_failed_events
| fields metadata_sourceCategory, %"fields.reason", today, today_vs_yesterday,show_failed_events
| sort today

_index=sec_record_failure*
| count by %"fields.reason"
| sort _count

_index=sec_record_failure*
| count by metadata_sourceCategory
| sort _count

panels.text:
1. Use the link in the below table to [Paste raw events into the Parser](https://help.sumologic.com/Cloud_SIEM_Enterprise/CSE_Schema/Parser_Editor#using-paste-logs)
2. Share the result in errors with your Sumo contact or via a support ticket to determine why a record has failed to parse or map

**Config** change the instance paramater to the name of your CIP instance.

panels.title: About
panels.text:
Use this dashboard to see information in insights, signals and records that pertain to a specific rule. 

Typical use case for this dashboard is to filter by rule keyword to one or more spedific rules to:
-  determine how the rule is impacting generation of insights and signals
- what are the top entities, source record types or deviceventids that might be reviewed to create tuning config (such as tuning expressions, match list updates or entity group configuration).
- what source record metadata results in signal generation.

Filter this dashboard to a specific rule using the rule id or a keyword string identifying the rule name. This is applied as a keyword search to the base searches.

panels.title: Signals
panels.text: Matching data in sec_signal index. Use these panels to understand how many signals are generated and suppressed and which entities, and mapping metadata (such as product, vendor etc) generate signals.

panels.title: Insights
panels.text: This section shows insights generated where this rule generated a contributing signal.

queries.queryString:
(_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourcecategory=cseinsight insightupdated
OR
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourcecategory=cseinsight insightcreated)

{{{rule}}}

| json field=_raw "eventName"
//| json field=_raw "insightIdentity.id" as id
| json field=_raw "insightIdentity.readableId" as insightid
| json field=_raw "insight.status" as status
| json field=_raw "insight.name" as name
| json field=_raw "insight.entityType" as entitytype
| json field=_raw "insight.entityValue" as entityvalue
| json field=_raw "insight.tags" as tags
| json field=_raw "insight.severity" as severity
| json field=_raw "insight.confidence" as confidence
| json field=_raw "insight.signals" as signals

// in closed events
| json field=_raw "insight.assignee" as assignee nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.resolution" as resolution nodrop

// in update events 
//| json field=_raw "to" as last_change nodrop

// may exist after an update
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToResponse" as timeToResponse nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToDetection" as timeToDetection nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToRemediation" as timeToRemediation nodrop

| if (isnull(timeToResponse),-1,timeToResponse/3600) as timeToResponse
| if (isnull(timeToDetection),-1,timeToDetection/3600) as timeToDetection
| if (isnull(timeToRemediation),-1,timeToRemediation/3600) as timeToRemediation
| sort _messagetime

| json field=_raw "insight.confidence" as confidence
| json field=_raw "insight.riskScore" as riskscore

// ensure we only store the most recent result
| count as events, max(_messagetime) as _messagetime,first(status) as status,first(tags) as tags, max(severity) as severity,first(confidence) as confidence,first(assignee) as assignee,first(resolution) as resolution,first(timeToResponse) as timeToResponse,first(timeToDetection) as timeToDetection,first(timeToRemediation) as timeToRemediation,first(signals) as signals,values(eventname) as eventnames by insightid,name,entitytype,entityvalue ,risk_score,confidence

// lets squash down size of the signals field so we don't generate a massive lookup
| parse regex field=signals "\"ruleId\":\"(?<rule>[^\"]+\",\"ruleName\":\"[^\"]+\")" multi
| replace (rule,"\",\""," ") as rule
| replace (rule,"\"","") as rule
| replace (rule,"ruleName","") as rule

| parse regex field=tags "\"(?<tag>[^\":,]+:[^\",:]+)\"" multi
| parse regex field=signals "(?<signal>\{\"id\":\"[^\}]+\})" multi
| parse regex field=signals "\"severity\":\"(?<severity>[0-9]+)" 
| json field=signal "id" as signal_id


// final aggregation to save to a lookup with only one row for most recent status of insight
| values(resolution) as resolutions,avg(risk_score) as risk,avg(confidence) as confidence,values(insightid) as insight,avg(severity) as sev, count_distinct(insightid) as insights,count_distinct(entityvalue) as entities, count_distinct(signal_id) as signals by rule ,entityvalue //,first(signals) as signals,
| sort rule asc | where rule matches /(?i){{{rule}}}/
| sev * signals as total_sev | sort total_sev

_index=sec_signal
{{{rule}}}

| if (isempty(suppressedreasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed

| if(suppressed="YES",1,0) as is_suppressed
| if(suppressed="NO",1,0) as is_generated

| json field=entities "[0].value" as entityid nodrop

| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_vendor" as vendor nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_sourceCategory" as sourceCategory nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_product" as product nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_mapperName" as mapperName nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_deviceEventId" as deviceEventId nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_parser" as parser nodrop
| concat (ruleid," ",rulename) as rule

| parse regex field=tags "\"(?<tagname>[^:\"]+):(?<tagvalue>[^:\"]+)" multi
//| count by attack_stage,tags | sort _count

//| where !(tagname matches "_mitreAttack*")
//|  sum(is_generated) as created by tagvalue,rule,product,vendor,entityid,severity,description| created * severity as total_sev | sort total_sev
| max(severity) as max_sev,count_distinct(entityid) as entities,count_distinct(rule) as rules by tagname,tagvalue

_index=sec_signal
{{{rule}}}

| where !(isempty(suppressedReasons))

| timeslice  | count as suppressed  by _timeslice | compare with timeshift 7d

_index=sec_signal
{{{rule}}}

| json field=entities "[0].value" as entityid
| if (isempty(suppressedreasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed
| where suppressed="YES"

| concat (ruleid," ",rulename) as rule
| parse regex field=suppressedreasons "\"(?<suppress_by>[^\":\[\]]+)" multi
| count_distinct(id) as suppressed_signals,values(suppress_by) as reasons by entityid | sort suppressed_signals

_index=sec_signal
{{{rule}}}

| json field=entities "[0].value" as entityid
| if (isempty(suppressedreasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed
| where suppressed="YES"

| concat (ruleid," ",rulename) as rule
| parse regex field=suppressedreasons "\"(?<suppress_by>[^\":\[\]]+)" multi
| count_distinct(entityid) as entities,count_distinct(id) as suppressed_signals by suppress_by

(_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourcecategory=cse* 
OR
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourcecategory=cse* )
*Rule*

{{{rule}}}
//THRESHOLD-S00096

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| where eventname matches "*Rule*"
| json field=_raw "operator.email" as operator nodrop
| json field=_raw "from" as old nodrop
| json field=_raw "to" as new nodrop

| json field=_raw "matchRule" as ruleb nodrop

| json field=_raw "thresholdRule" as ruled nodrop
| json field=_raw "chainRule" as rulee nodrop
| json field=_raw "aggregationRule" as rulef nodrop

| rulea as rule
| if(isempty(rule),ruleb,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),rulec,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),ruled,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),rulee,rule) as rule
| if(isempty(rule),rulef,rule) as rule

//| where isempty(rule)

| json field=rule "isPrototype"  nodrop
| json field=rule "tags"  nodrop
| formatdate(tolong(_messagetime),"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm") as time
| count by time,_messagetime,eventname,id,interface,name,enabled,isPrototype,operator,expression,severitymapping,tuningexpressions,tags, old,new | fields -_count // tuningexpressions
| where id matches /(?i){{{rule}}}/
| sort _messagetime  | fields -_messagetime

panels.title: Custom Insight Score by Resolution Code

queries.queryString:
(_index=sumologic_audit_events)
| json field=_raw "insight.source" as source
| json field=_raw "insight.signals" as sig
| json field=_raw "eventId"
| json field=_raw "to.status" as status
| where subsystem = "cse" and status = "closed" and source = "RULE"
| parse regex field=sig "\"name\":\"(?<signal_name>[^\"]*)\".+?(?=severity)severity\":\"(?<signal_severity>[^\,]*)\"" multi
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToDetection" as Meantimetodetect
| json field=_raw "to.resolution" as resolution
| int(signal_severity) as sev
//| avg(Meantimetodetect) as MTTD 
//| count_distinct(signal_name) by eventId, resolution, Meantimetodetect,sev
| count by signal_name,eventId, resolution, Meantimetodetect,sev
//| sum(_count_distinct) as sev by eventId, resolution, Meantimetodetect
| sum(sev) as sev by eventId, resolution, Meantimetodetect
| avg(sev),pct(sev, 50) as median,stddev(sev),avg(Meantimetodetect) as MTTD by resolution
| round(_avg,2) as Average
| round(_stddev,2) as stddev
| MTTD/3600 as MTTDHours | round(MTTDHours)
| MTTD/86400 as MTTDDays | round(MTTDDays)
| fields - _avg, _stddev
| fields -MTTD

panels.title: ALGORITHM - Top False Positive  AND No Action Signals

queries.queryString:
(_index=sumologic_audit_events)
| json field=_raw "insight.signals" as sig
| json field=_raw "eventId"
| json field=_raw "to.status" as status
| json field=_raw "to.resolution" as resolution
| where subsystem = "cse" and status = "closed"
| if(resolution = "False Positive", 1, 0) as fp_count
| total(fp_count) as fp_count
| 1 as _row| total(_row) as total_insights
| last(fp_count) as fp_count, last(total_insights) as total_insights
| (fp_count/total_insights) * 100 as fp_ratio| concat(round(fp_ratio), "%") as fp_ratio| fields fp_ratio

children.description: A dashboard to overview or explore CSE Insights using the sumologic_*_audit events (phase II).
children.title: Insights Console (Tuning Pack)

queries.queryString:
(_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourcecategory=cseinsight insightupdated
OR
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourcecategory=cseinsight insightcreated)

{{{keywords}}}

| json field=_raw "eventName"
//| json field=_raw "insightIdentity.id" as id
| json field=_raw "insightIdentity.readableId" as insightid
| json field=_raw "insight.status" as status
| json field=_raw "insight.name" as name
| json field=_raw "insight.entityType" as entitytype
| json field=_raw "insight.entityValue" as entityvalue
| json field=_raw "insight.tags" as tags
| json field=_raw "insight.severity" as severity
| json field=_raw "insight.confidence" as confidence
| json field=_raw "insight.signals" as signals

// in closed events
| json field=_raw "insight.assignee" as assignee nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.resolution" as resolution nodrop

// severity used to be numeric but now it's not
| tostring(severity) as sev_string
| 0 as s
| if (sev_string matches /1|LOW/,1,s) as s
| if (sev_string matches /2|MEDIUM/,2,s) as s
| if (sev_string matches /3|HIGH/,3,s) as s
| if (sev_string matches /4|CRITICAL/,4,s) as s

// may exist after an update
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToResponse" as timeToResponse nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToDetection" as timeToDetection nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToRemediation" as timeToRemediation nodrop

| if (isnull(timeToResponse),-1,timeToResponse/3600) as timeToResponse
| if (isnull(timeToDetection),-1,timeToDetection/3600) as timeToDetection
| if (isnull(timeToRemediation),-1,timeToRemediation/3600) as timeToRemediation
| sort _messagetime

// severity used to be numeric but for a while it wasn't so covering bases here
| tostring(severity) as sev_string
| 0 as s
| if (sev_string matches /1|HIGH/,1,s) as s
| if (sev_string matches /2|MEDIUM/,2,s) as s
| if (sev_string matches /3|LOW/,3,s) as s
| s as severity
| if(s = 1,"1. HIGH","OTHER") as severity
| if(s = 2,"2. MEDIUM",severity) as severity
| if(s = 3,"3. LOW",severity) as severity
| if(s = 0,"0. OTHER",severity) as severity

// ensure we only store the most recent result
|  max(_messagetime) as _messagetime,first(status) as status,first(tags) as tags, min(s) as sev,first(confidence) as confidence,first(assignee) as assignee,first(resolution) as resolution,first(timeToResponse) as timeToResponse,first(timeToDetection) as timeToDetection,first(timeToRemediation) as timeToRemediation,first(signals) as signals,values(eventname) as eventnames by insightid,name,entitytype,entityvalue ,severity
| if (resolution = "False Positive",1,0) as fp
| if(resolution = "No Action", 1, 0) as na
| 4 - sev as true_s
| sum(true_s) as sev_score,values(severity) as severities,values(insightid) as insight,count_distinct(insightid) as insights,sum(fp) as false_positive,sum(na) as no_action,avg(confidence) as avg_conf by entityvalue 
| sort sev_score,insights ,avg_conf | avg_conf * 100 as avg_conf

panels.title: About
panels.text:
This dashboard displays Cloud SIEM Enterprise Insight audit events from the ```sumologic_*_events``` audit indexes for Insights created or updated.

You can filter the output using the **keywords** parameter: * for all values,  or one or more keywords such as: ```TA1234```  insights with string TA134, ```log*```  login, logout etc,```laptop123 brute```  laptop123 and brute.

panels.title: Insights Closed By Time and Severity

queries.queryString:
(_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourcecategory=cseinsight insightupdated
OR
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourcecategory=cseinsight insightcreated)

{{{keywords}}}

closed

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "insightIdentity.id" as id
| json field=_raw "insightIdentity.readableId" as insightid
| json field=_raw "insight.status" as status
| json field=_raw "insight.name" as name
| json field=_raw "insight.entityType" as entitytype
| json field=_raw "insight.entityValue" as entityvalue
| json field=_raw "insight.tags" as tags
| json field=_raw "insight.severity" as severity
| json field=_raw "insight.confidence" as confidence
| json field=_raw "insight.signals" as signals

// in closed events
| json field=_raw "insight.assignee" as assignee nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.resolution" as resolution nodrop

// in update events 
//| json field=_raw "to" as last_change nodrop

// may exist after an update
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToResponse" as timeToResponse nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToDetection" as timeToDetection nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToRemediation" as timeToRemediation nodrop

| if (isnull(timeToResponse),-1,timeToResponse/3600) as timeToResponse
| if (isnull(timeToDetection),-1,timeToDetection/3600) as timeToDetection
| if (isnull(timeToRemediation),-1,timeToRemediation/3600) as timeToRemediation
| sort _messagetime
| timeslice by {{graph_by_timeslice}}

// severity used to be numeric but for a while it wasn't so covering bases here
| tostring(severity) as sev_string
| 0 as s
| if (sev_string matches /1|HIGH/,1,s) as s
| if (sev_string matches /2|MEDIUM/,2,s) as s
| if (sev_string matches /3|LOW/,3,s) as s
| s as severity
| if(s = 1,"1. HIGH","OTHER") as severity
| if(s = 2,"2. MEDIUM",severity) as severity
| if(s = 3,"3. LOW",severity) as severity
| if(s = 0,"0. OTHER",severity) as severity

// ensure we only store the most recent result
| count as events,first(status) as status,first(tags) as tags, max(s) as max_sev,first(confidence) as confidence,first(assignee) as assignee,first(resolution) as resolution,first(timeToResponse) as timeToResponse,first(timeToDetection) as timeToDetection,first(timeToRemediation) as timeToRemediation,first(signals) as signals,values(eventname) as eventnames by insightid,name,entitytype,entityvalue ,_timeslice,severity

//// lets squash down size of the signals field so we don't generate a massive lookup
//| parse regex field=signals "\"ruleId\":\"(?<rule>[^\"]+\",\"ruleName\":\"[^\"]+\")" multi
//| replace (rule,"\"","") as rule
//| replace (rule,"ruleName","") as rule
//
// final aggregation to save to a lookup with only one row for most recent status of insight
| where status="closed"


| first(status) as status, max(max_sev) as max_sev,avg(confidence) as confidence,first(assignee) as assignee,first(resolution) as resolution,first(timeToResponse) as timeToResponse,first(timeToDetection) as timeToDetection,first(timeToRemediation) as timeToRemediation,first(eventnames) as eventnames by insightid,name,entitytype,entityvalue,_timeslice,severity //,first(signals) as signals,

| count by _timeslice,severity

// ensure we only store the most recent result
 | transpose row _timeslice column severity

| json field=_raw "insight.resolution" as resolution nodrop

// in update events 
| json field=_raw "to" as updates nodrop

// may exist after an update

| json field=_raw "insight.timeToDetection" as timeToDetection nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToRemediation" as timeToRemediation nodrop

| if (isnull(timeToResponse),-1,timeToResponse/3600) as timeToResponse
| if (isnull(timeToDetection),-1,timeToDetection/3600) as timeToDetection
| if (isnull(timeToRemediation),-1,timeToRemediation/3600) as timeToRemediation
| sort _messagetime
| formatdate(tolong(_messagetime),"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") as time
// ensure we only store the most recent result
| count by time,insightid,name,eventname,entitytype,entityvalue,status,severity,confidence,assignee,resolution,updates,_messagetime,riskscore
| sort _messagetime
| first(status) as status,first(time) as time,first(assignee) as assignee,first(severity) as severity, first(riskscore) as riskscore by insightid,name,eventname,entitytype,entityvalue,resolution,confidence | sort insightid

| if (isnull(timeToRemediation),-1,timeToRemediation/3600) as timeToRemediation
| sort _messagetime

// ensure we only store the most recent result
| count as events, max(_messagetime) as _messagetime,first(status) as status,first(tags) as tags, max(severity) as severity,first(confidence) as confidence,first(assignee) as assignee,first(resolution) as resolution,first(timeToResponse) as timeToResponse,first(timeToDetection) as timeToDetection,first(timeToRemediation) as timeToRemediation,first(signals) as signals,values(eventname) as eventnames by insightid,name,entitytype,entityvalue 

// explode signals array embedded in insight to get individual severities and tags
//| parse regex field=tags "\"(?<tag>[^\":,]+:[^\",:]+)\"" multi
| parse regex field=signals "(?<signal>\{\"id\":\"[^\}]+\})" multi
| json field=signal "id" as s_id
| json field=signal "tags" as signaltags
| parse regex field=signaltags "\"(?<s_tag>[^\"\:]+):(?<s_value>[^\"]+)" multi
| parse regex field=tags "_mitreAttackTactic:(?<tactic>[^\":\r\n]+)" multi
| parse regex field=tags "_mitreAttackTechnique:(?<technique>[^\":\r\n]+)" multi
| parse regex field=signals "\"severity\":\"(?<s_severity>[0-9]+)" 

| "" as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0043","a.Reconnaissance",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0042","b.Resource Development",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0001","c.Initial Access",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0002","d.Execution",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0003","e.Persistence",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0004","f.Privilege Escalation",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0005","g.Defense Evasion",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0006","h.Credential Access",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0007","i.Discovery",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0008","j.Lateral Movement",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0009","k.Collection",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0011","l.Command and Control",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0010","m.Exfiltration",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0040","n.Impact",stage) as stage

//|max(_messagetime) as _messagetime,first(status) as status,first(confidence) as confidence,first(assignee) as assignee,first(resolution) as resolution by insightid,name,entitytype,entityvalue,s_id,s_severity,s_tag,s_value, stage, tactic,technique
//



// unique signals per stage and technique

//| transpose row technique column stage
//
// unique insights per stage and technique 
//| count_distinct(insightid) as insights by stage,technique
//| transpose row technique column stage

// techniques per stage
| count by insightid,s_id,stage,technique,entitytype,entityvalue
//| concat("https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/",replace (technique,".","/")) as mitre_url
| sort stage asc, technique asc
| now() as _messagetime
| transactionize stage (merge stage takeFirst,technique takeDistinct)
//| values (technique)  as techniques by stage
| 1 as r
| max(r) as r by stage,technique  
| values(technique) as techniques by stage,r
| transpose row r column stage | fields -r

{{{keywords}}}

closed

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "insightIdentity.id" as id
| json field=_raw "insightIdentity.readableId" as insightid
| json field=_raw "insight.status" as status
| json field=_raw "insight.name" as name
| json field=_raw "insight.entityType" as entitytype
| json field=_raw "insight.entityValue" as entityvalue
| json field=_raw "insight.tags" as tags
| json field=_raw "insight.severity" as severity
| json field=_raw "insight.confidence" as confidence
| json field=_raw "insight.signals" as signals

// in closed events
| json field=_raw "insight.assignee" as assignee nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.resolution" as resolution nodrop

// in update events 
//| json field=_raw "to" as last_change nodrop

// may exist after an update
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToResponse" as timeToResponse nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToDetection" as timeToDetection nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToRemediation" as timeToRemediation nodrop

| if (isnull(timeToResponse),-1,timeToResponse/3600) as timeToResponse
| if (isnull(timeToDetection),-1,timeToDetection/3600) as timeToDetection
| if (isnull(timeToRemediation),-1,timeToRemediation/3600) as timeToRemediation
| sort _messagetime
| timeslice by {{graph_by_timeslice}}

// severity used to be numeric but for a while it wasn't so covering bases here
| tostring(severity) as sev_string
| 0 as s
| if (sev_string matches /1|HIGH/,1,s) as s
| if (sev_string matches /2|MEDIUM/,2,s) as s
| if (sev_string matches /3|LOW/,3,s) as s
| s as severity
| if(s = 1,"1. HIGH","OTHER") as severity
| if(s = 2,"2. MEDIUM",severity) as severity
| if(s = 3,"3. LOW",severity) as severity
| if(s = 0,"0. OTHER",severity) as severity

// ensure we only store the most recent result
| count as events,first(status) as status,first(tags) as tags, max(s) as max_sev,first(confidence) as confidence,first(assignee) as assignee,first(resolution) as resolution,first(timeToResponse) as timeToResponse,first(timeToDetection) as timeToDetection,first(timeToRemediation) as timeToRemediation,first(signals) as signals,values(eventname) as eventnames by insightid,name,entitytype,entityvalue ,_timeslice,severity

//// lets squash down size of the signals field so we don't generate a massive lookup
//| parse regex field=signals "\"ruleId\":\"(?<rule>[^\"]+\",\"ruleName\":\"[^\"]+\")" multi
//| replace (rule,"\"","") as rule
//| replace (rule,"ruleName","") as rule
//
// final aggregation to save to a lookup with only one row for most recent status of insight
| where status="closed"


| first(status) as status, max(max_sev) as max_sev,avg(confidence) as confidence,first(assignee) as assignee,first(resolution) as resolution,first(timeToResponse) as timeToResponse,first(timeToDetection) as timeToDetection,first(timeToRemediation) as timeToRemediation,first(eventnames) as eventnames by insightid,name,entitytype,entityvalue,_timeslice,severity //,first(signals) as signals,

| count by _timeslice,resolution

// ensure we only store the most recent result
 | transpose row _timeslice column resolution

panels.title: About
panels.text:
This dashboard shows an overview and some detailed tabular views for reflected CSE Signal events, specifically mapping, parsers and suppression.

The data source is the sec_signal index.

For more help on signal suppression reasons and configuration see: https://help.sumologic.com/Cloud_SIEM_Enterprise/Records%2C_Signals%2C_Entities%2C_and_Insights/About_Signal_Suppression

Version: 20220830

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_signal 
 {{{keywords}}}

| if (isempty(suppressedReasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed
| where suppressed = "YES"
| if (suppressed="YES",1,0) as is_suppressed
| if(suppressed="NO",1,0) as is_generated

| timeslice  | sum(is_suppressed) as suppressed  by _timeslice | compare with timeshift 7d

_index=sec_signal
  {{{keywords}}}

| if (isempty(suppressedreasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed

| if(suppressed="YES",1,0) as is_suppressed
| if(suppressed="NO",1,0) as is_generated

| json field=entities "[0].value" as entityid nodrop

| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_vendor" as vendor nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_sourceCategory" as sourceCategory nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_product" as product nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_mapperName" as mapperName nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_deviceEventId" as deviceEventId nodrop

| concat (ruleid," ",rulename) as rule

| count_distinct(entityid) as entities,sum(is_suppressed) as suppressed,sum(is_generated) as generated by rule,product,vendor,mapperName,sourceCategory
| sort suppressed

| json field=entities "[0].value" as entityid

| where suppressed="YES"

| concat (ruleid," ",rulename) as rule
| parse regex field=suppressedreasons "\"(?<suppress_by>[^\":\[\]]+)" multi
| count_distinct(id) as suppressed_signals,values(suppress_by) as reasons by entityid,rule | sort suppressed_signals

_index=sec_signal 
 {{{keywords}}}

| if (suppressed="YES",1,0) as is_suppressed
| if(suppressed="NO",1,0) as is_generated

| timeslice  | sum(is_generated) as generated  by _timeslice | compare with timeshift 7d

_index=sec_signal
  {{{keywords}}}

| if (isempty(suppressedreasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed

| if(suppressed="YES",1,0) as is_suppressed
| if(suppressed="NO",1,0) as is_generated

| json field=entities "[0].value" as entityid nodrop

| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_vendor" as vendor nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_sourceCategory" as sourceCategory nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_product" as product nodrop
//| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_mapperName" as mapperName nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_deviceEventId" as deviceEventId nodrop

| concat (ruleid," ",rulename) as rule

| count_distinct(entityid) as entities,sum(is_suppressed) as suppressed,sum(is_generated) as generated by rule,severity,product,vendor,sourceCategory
| severity * generated as total_severity
| sort total_severity

panels.title: About
panels.text:
This dashboard shows key insights and signals with a lens designed for reviewing a single entity.

You can enter any entity name in the entity paramenter, it will be applied in panel searches as a keyword. This means in theory you can use more complex scopes if you like such as ``` ( entitya or entityb)```

This dashboard is designed to be able to be linked as a CSE Action using the entity as the variable see: https://help.sumologic.com/docs/cse/administration/create-cse-context-actions/. This enables a detailed drilldown to here for a specific entity from the CSE UI.

Version: 20230222

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourcecategory=cseinsight insightcreated

{{entity}}

| json field=_raw "insight.entityValue" as entity
| where entity matches "{{entity}}"

| json field=_raw "insightIdentity.readableId" as insightid
| json field=_raw "insight.severity" as severity


| first(severity) as severity, min(_messagetime) as _messagetime,count as events by insightid,entity
| tolong(_messagetime) as _messagetime
| timeslice
// severity used to be numeric but now it's not
| tostring(severity) as sev_string
| 0 as s
| if (sev_string matches /1|LOW/,1,s) as s
| if (sev_string matches /2|MEDIUM/,2,s) as s
| if (sev_string matches /3|HIGH/,3,s) as s
| if (sev_string matches /4|CRITICAL/,4,s) as s
| s as severity
| if(s = 1,"LOW","OTHER") as severity
| if(s = 2,"MEDIUM",severity) as severity
| if(s = 3,"HIGH",severity) as severity
| if(s = 4,"CRITICAL",severity) as severity

| count as insights by _timeslice,severity | transpose row _timeslice column severity

(_index=sumologic_audit_events _sourcecategory=cseinsight insightupdated
OR
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourcecategory=cseinsight insightcreated)

{{entity}}

| json field=_raw "insight.entityValue" as entity
| where entity matches "{{entity}}"


| json field=_raw "eventName"
//| json field=_raw "insightIdentity.id" as id
| json field=_raw "insightIdentity.readableId" as insightid
| json field=_raw "insight.status" as status
| json field=_raw "insight.name" as name
| json field=_raw "insight.entityType" as entitytype
| json field=_raw "insight.entityValue" as entityvalue
| json field=_raw "insight.tags" as tags
| json field=_raw "insight.severity" as severity
| json field=_raw "insight.confidence" as confidence
| json field=_raw "insight.signals" as signals

// in closed events
| json field=_raw "insight.assignee" as assignee nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.resolution" as resolution nodrop

// in update events 
| json field=_raw "to" as updates nodrop

// may exist after an update
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToResponse" as timeToResponse nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToDetection" as timeToDetection nodrop
| json field=_raw "insight.timeToRemediation" as timeToRemediation nodrop

| if (isnull(timeToResponse),-1,timeToResponse/3600) as timeToResponse
| if (isnull(timeToDetection),-1,timeToDetection/3600) as timeToDetection
| if (isnull(timeToRemediation),-1,timeToRemediation/3600) as timeToRemediation
| sort _messagetime
| formatdate(tolong(_messagetime),"yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") as time
// severity used to be numeric but now it's not
| tostring(severity) as sev_string
| 0 as s
| if (sev_string matches /1|LOW/,1,s) as s
| if (sev_string matches /2|MEDIUM/,2,s) as s
| if (sev_string matches /3|HIGH/,3,s) as s
| if (sev_string matches /4|CRITICAL/,4,s) as s
| s as severity
| if(s = 1,"LOW","OTHER") as severity
| if(s = 2,"MEDIUM",severity) as severity
| if(s = 3,"HIGH",severity) as severity
| if(s = 4,"CRITICAL",severity) as severity

// ensure we only store the most recent result
| count by time,insightid,name,eventname,entity,status,severity,confidence,assignee,resolution,_messagetime
| sort _messagetime | fields -_count,_messagetime

_index=sec_signal
 {{entity}}

| if (isempty(suppressedreasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed

| if(suppressed="YES",1,0) as is_suppressed
| if(suppressed="NO",1,0) as is_generated

| json field=entities "[0].value" as entityid nodrop

| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_vendor" as vendor nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_sourceCategory" as sourceCategory nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_product" as product nodrop
//| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_mapperName" as mapperName nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_deviceEventId" as deviceEventId nodrop

| concat (ruleid," ",rulename) as rule

| count_distinct(entityid) as entities,sum(is_suppressed) as suppressed,sum(is_generated) as generated by rule,severity,product,vendor,sourceCategory
| severity * generated as total_severity
| sort total_severity

queries.queryString:
_index=sec_signal
 {{entity}}

| if (isempty(suppressedreasons),"NO","YES") as suppressed

| if(suppressed="YES",1,0) as is_suppressed
| if(suppressed="NO",1,0) as is_generated

| json field=entities "[0].value" as entityid nodrop

| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_vendor" as vendor nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_sourceCategory" as sourceCategory nodrop
| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_product" as product nodrop
//| json field=fullRecords "[0].metadata_mapperName" as mapperName nodrop

panels.title: Tags In Signals That Generated An Insight

queries.queryString:
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourcecategory=cseinsight insightcreated

{{entity}}

| json field=_raw "insight.entityValue" as entity

| where entity matches "{{entity}}"
| json field=_raw "eventName" nodrop
//| json field=_raw "insightIdentity.id" as id
| json field=_raw "insightIdentity.readableId" as insightid
| json field=_raw "insight.status" as status
| json field=_raw "insight.name" as name
| json field=_raw "insight.entityType" as entitytype
| json field=_raw "insight.entityValue" as entityvalue
| json field=_raw "insight.tags" as tags
| json field=_raw "insight.severity" as severity
| json field=_raw "insight.confidence" as confidence
| json field=_raw "insight.signals" as signals

// ensure we only store the most recent result
| count as events, max(_messagetime) as _messagetime,first(status) as status,first(tags) as tags, max(severity) as severity,first(confidence) as confidence,first(signals) as signals,values(eventname) as eventnames by insightid,name,entitytype,entityvalue 

//// lets squash down size of the signals field so we don't generate a massive lookup
//| replace (rule,"\",\""," ") as rule
//| replace (rule,"\"","") as rule
//| replace (rule,"ruleName","") as rule
////
//| parse regex field=tags "\"(?<tag>[^\":,]+:[^\",:]+)\"" multi
| parse regex field=signals "(?<signal>\{\"id\":\"[^\}]+\})" multi
//| parse regex field=signal "\"severity\":\"(?<severity>[0-9]+)" 
| json field=signal "id","name","severity","summary","description","ruleId","ruleName","tags","suppressedReasons","created" nodrop

// squshdown
| count by created,insightid,id,name,severity,summary,description,ruleid,rulename,tags,entityvalue | fields -_count 
| parse regex field=tags "\"(?<tag>[^\":,]+:[^\",:]+)\"" multi

// tactics
| parse field=tag "_mitreAttackTactic:*" as tactic nodrop
| "" as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0043","a.Reconnaissance",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0042","b.Resource Development",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0001","c.Initial Access",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0002","d.Execution",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0003","e.Persistence",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0004","f.Privilege Escalation",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0005","g.Defense Evasion",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0006","h.Credential Access",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0007","i.Discovery",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0008","j.Lateral Movement",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0009","k.Collection",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0011","l.Command and Control",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0010","m.Exfiltration",stage) as stage
| if(tactic = "TA0040","n.Impact",stage) as stage


// tech
| replace(tag,"_mitreAttackTechnique:","") as T
| replace(T,".","/") as T
| concat("https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/",T) as Tl
| if( tag matches "_mitreAttackTech*",tourl(Tl,T),"") as Mitre
| if(!(isempty(stage)),stage,Mitre) as Mitre

// final aggregation to save to a lookup with only one row for most recent status of insight
| avg(severity) as avg_sev, count_distinct(insightid) as insights,count_distinct(entityvalue) as entities, count_distinct(id) as signals by tag,Mitre  //,first(signals) as signals,
| sort tag asc
